AutoShow

Make cars more than a passion.
Make them a career and learn from the best.

Get Started

Automotive Business School of Canada

The Automotive Business School of Canada at Georgian College was created over 30 years ago by the autmovtive industry, for the automotive industry. Offereing unique undergraduate business study options for those lokking to become the future leaders of the industry in Canada. Our students graduate with up to one year of paid co-op work experience, top networking opportunities, and a specialized education that will set them apart.

Schedule of Events

To obtain a complete list of events, please click on the link provided by the relevant organization or venue, which may lead you to their official website or other authorized sources.

Map

To obtain the map for the autoshow, please follow the link or directions provided by the event organizers, which may be available on their website, social media pages, or through other promotional materials.

Tickets
